A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luke Skywalker dies. More feminist garbage\, more bad plots and terrible tropes. Leia survives via a force field? Snoke dies with no explanation as to who he is (just another pointless plot thread)\, stupid porgs\, characters we dont care about and lots of CGI. The crap Disney is turning out is low quality fan fiction. Im now done with the Star Wars franchise altogether and Ive been a die hard fan since 77.
